mapper.insert: INSERT INTO core_session(token, user_id, create_date, expire_date) VALUES (#{token}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{expireDate})
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM core_session s LEFT JOIN core_user_basic u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.token = #{token} AND s.expire_date > NOW() AND u.del_flag = 0 LIMIT 1;
